section.heading: County mosquito control commission; compensation; expenses; officers

content.p:
ยง 1522. County mosquito control commission; compensation; expenses;
officers. 1. All members of a county mosquito control commission shall
serve without compensation, except that the necessary expenses of each
member for actual attendance at meetings of such commission shall be
allowed and paid.
 2. Such commission shall annually choose from among its members a
president and a treasurer, who shall serve without pay, and they shall
respectively perform the duties usually performed by persons holding
such offices.
 3. Such commission may appoint a secretary, whose compensation shall
be fixed by the commission, by and with the approval of the board of
supervisors.
 4. No person employed by such commission shall be a member thereof.
